to: html
  output-file: posts.html
  standalone: true
  title-prefix: Bedirhan Avdancı
  section-divs: true
  html-math-method: mathjax
  wrap: none
  default-image-extension: png
  css:
    - styles.css
  toc: true
  variables: {}
  
metadata
  document-css: false
  link-citations: true
  date-format: long
  lang: en
  right:
    - text: |
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
             viewBox="0 0 24 24"
             width="18"
             height="18"
             style="vertical-align: middle;">
          <path fill="currentColor"
                d="M18.244 2H21.552L14.323 10.471L22.885 22H16.197L10.932 15.007L4.962 22H1.65L9.337 13.021L1.115 2H7.978L12.74 8.444L18.244 2Z"/>
        </svg>
      href: https://x.com/bedirhan_avd
    - text: Contact
      menu:
        - text: bedirhan.avd@gmail.com
          href: mailto:bedirhan.avd@gmail.com
  theme: cosmo
  title: Blog
  listing:
    contents: posts
    sort: date desc
    type: grid
    categories: true
    fields:
      - image
      - date
      - title
      - reading-time
      - description
      - categories
